text: Nyang ladom ureueng jicok keu Tuhan Nyang dalam alam laen bak Allah Tuhan nyang jicok jigaseh that-that Sang-sang jih meuhat gaseh keu Allah Di ureueng mukmin nyang that jigaseh Hana nyang leubeh nibak Potallah Sangkira jieu uleh silalem Azeub bak Tuhan saket sileupah Jiteupue teuga sidroe Hadharat Azeub saket that dudoe Neubalah
